additions: Added new permissions system which works alongside the new roles.
Redesigned the !help command, check it out. (It's beautiful).
!help will only list the commands you have access to, unless you're checking a specific command, e.g. `!help restart`
Permissions for command-specific features (e.g. voteskip vs force skip)
Music playback bug fixes and stability improvements (I know it's quite broken for now)
